__e: Donald's a good guy and everything, but I just wasn't feeling it.
Hang it all, he's the only one who knows where Donald went to.
Are you telling us Old Donald is dead?
I spoke with Donald, and he would like to come tomorrow.
So, that's when I went back and I... told my mother and father and Donald and Darryl that it was her.
No, I've come up to see your Uncle Donald, and your mother insisted that I say hello.
Donald, I gotta tell you, you... you are the man!
Donald, I rode an airship across the top of the world to tell you this.
No thanks, donald dear. I don't drink.
